alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds that are made up of carbon and hydrogen atoms only.
alternative_parents.name: Aromatic hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Hydrocarbons that contains one or more unsaturated carbon atoms. These compounds contain one or more double, triple, or aromatic bonds.
alternative_parents.name: Unsaturated hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbon-sulfur bond.
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfur compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organonitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with a positive electric charge.
alternative_parents.name: Organic cations

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzene and substituted derivatives. These are aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.

direct_parent.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
direct_parent.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
